channel.title: My food doesn't heal

item.title: My food doesn't heal
item.dc:creator: @droidmobile droidmobile@yahoo.com
item.description:
@droidmobile wrote:

[code] case 7060:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (c.inTrade) { c.sM(“You can’t do this in trade.”); return; }
c.setAnimation(0x33D);
//c.playSound(317, 000, 020);
c.sM(“You eat the tuna potato”);
if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){
c.sM(“It heals some health.”);
}
c.deleteItem(7060, slot, 1);
c.currentHealth += 16;
if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints])
c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints];
c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + “”, 4016);
break;
case 4049:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (c.inTrade) { c.sM(“You can’t do this in trade.”); return; }
c.currentHealth += 10;
if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints])
c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints];
c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + “”, 4016);
c.deleteItem(4049, slot, 1);
break;
case 526:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (c.inTrade) { c.sM(“You can’t do this in trade.”); return; }
c.prayerMessage(100,526);

return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (c.inTrade) { c.sM(“You can’t do this in trade.”); return; }
c.prayerMessage(300,536);
break;
case 1961:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (c.inTrade) { c.sM(“You can’t do this in trade.”); return; }
c.setAnimation(0x33D);
//c.playSound(317, 000, 020);
c.sM(“You eat the easter egg.”);
if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){
c.sM(“It heals some health.”);
}

c.currentHealth += 22;
if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints])
c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints];
c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + “”, 4016);
break;
case 315:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (c.inTrade) { c.sM(“You can’t do this in trade.”); return; }
c.setAnimation(0x33D);
//c.playSound(317, 000, 020);
c.sM(“You eat the shrimps.”);
if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){

if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints])

c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + “”, 4016);

item.title: My food doesn't heal
item.dc:creator: @droidmobile droidmobile@yahoo.com
item.description:
@droidmobile wrote:

Ok this is what i got in my potions.java

case 1961: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (c.inTrade) { c.sM("You can't do this in trade."); return; } c.setAnimation(0x33D); //c.playSound(317, 000, 020); c.sM("You eat the easter egg."); if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){ c.sM("It heals some health."); } c.deleteItem(1961, slot, 1); c.currentHealth += 22; if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]) c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]; c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016); break;
It works for other players just not for Owner.

Read full topic
